bibl.title: Despatch from W.F. Wharton to Emory H. Taunt, August 30, 1890
Despatches from United States Consuls in Boma, 1888-1895
bibl.publisher: National Archives and Records Service General Services Administration

div1.ab:
Department of State Washington, August 30, 18910
Emory H. Taunt, Esquire Commercial Agent of the United States, Boma
div1.p:
Sir: Mr.George W. Williams in a latter addressed to the Departmetn on June 11th from Stanley Pool informs the Department that a United States flag is desired for the "Henry Reed" a Stea- mer belonging to the Amer- ican Baptist Missionary Union. If the vessel in question is duly registered
at

at your Agency as American owned you can present her with the eight foot flag which will befor- warded to you.
I am, Sir, your obident Servant,
William F. Wharton Acting Secretary
